department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: bronze (indigo); open front decorated with brown silk damask, red, white and blue embroidery and woven tape; back is an elaborate pattern of same in vertical and horizontal strips on solid brown damask; yoke and sleeves have same color woven tape; dark brown cuffs; blue lining
dimension: 27 x 39 in. (68.58 x 99.06 cm) (cuff to cuff)
title: Jacket
